question: First human heart transplant operation conducted by Dr. Christiaan Barnard on Louis Washkansky, was conducted in
answer_description: Louis Washkansky (1913 - 21 December 1967) was the recipient of the world's first human heart transplant.Washkansky died of double pneumonia eighteen days after the transplant because of a weakened immune system.
